post.author: khazzler
post.body:
Hi,
I wanna try playing the whole game without flashlight,
is there any command that can drop all my weapons (or just a single one)? The "drop weapon" button doesn't really seem to work.

Thanks in advance.

post.author: RangerMcFriendly
post.body: In the controls you can bind a key to drop weapons but I don't think it works in single player.

post.author: reko
post.body: You can disable the flashlight from the player.def

post.author: khazzler
post.body: I looked in my Doom 3 folder and i couldn't find any file called "player.def"

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
khazzler wrote:
I looked in my Doom 3 folder and i couldn't find any file called "player.def"

It's propably best to quickly go over the basics first. This should be an interesting link for you: http://www.iddevnet.com/doom3/packfiles.php

Read that, it will help!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
nothing defaults to the flashlight (ie run out of ammo, etc). Just don't use it.

Rebind "f" to nothing. You can't remove it during cinematics.

post.author: reko
post.body:
khazzler wrote:
I looked in my Doom 3 folder and i couldn't find any file called "player.def"


Yeah first you need to know the basics, just open the pk4 files with WinRar and open all you got there, etc.
You could also use http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Folder_stru ... 8Doom_3%29

post.author: khazzler
post.body: Thanks to all of you for the help.
